mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (customerNumber,companyNumber,personnel,requirements,reservationDate,visitStatus, createDate) VALUES ((select max(customerNumber2) FROM customer), #{companyNumber}, #{personnel}, #{requirements}, #{reservationDate}, #{visitStatus}, now());
mapper.select: select * FROM booking a INNER JOIN customer b on a.customerNumber = b.customerNumber2 WHERE TRUE AND companyNumber = 13 AND reservationNumber = #{BookingDto.reservationNumber}

SELECT * FROM booking a INNER JOIN customer b on a.customerNumber = b.customerNumber2 WHERE reservationDate LIKE CONCAT('%',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%') AND companyNumber = 13 ORDER BY reservationDate ASC, reservationNumber ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM booking a INNER JOIN customer b on a.customerNumber = b.customerNumber2 WHERE reservationDate LIKE CONCAT('%',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),'%') AND companyNumber = 13
